sub_title: Copy writing, proofreading, editing and Dutch-English translation services
summary:
Freelance copywriter, copy editor, proofreader and translator (NL-ENG), with 20+ years experience in marketing, PR & publishing. I have worked with international fashion, beauty, interiors & sportswear brands, as well as advertising, PR and recruitment agencies, restaurants, charitable organisations, museums and international publications. Very reliable with deadlines, flexible, impeccable attention to detail, and highly competitive rates. Contact: julia@gorodecky.com

- Fashion: Tommy Hilfiger Europe; Karl Lagerfeld; GANT; Vlisco; Dobotex; Suitsupply; WE Fashion; Colorful Licenses; VeldhovenGroup; Oilily; Mexx; The Finds; NoShirt 

- Sportswear: ASICS; Nike; PUMA; Adidas 

- Lifestyle: COSMANIA; Solaris; TEEEZ Cosmetics; LSA International; Adaptations

- Media: 5 Media; Flow (International Magazine, Specials, books & online); A-Mag/I amsterdam Magazine; MICEdition; AMS magazine; Amsterdam Luxury; Holland Herald (KLM magazine), Msafiri (Kenya Airways magazine), Sky High (KLM); Safaricom; Frame; Mo's Daughters Books; Time Out Amsterdam; Time Out Amsterdam City Guide Book (Editor); Elle Decor Italia; DK Top Ten Amsterdam Guide Book; MediaPartners Group; Uitgeverij van Oorschot 

- Agencies: Amsterdam Worldwide; 180 Amsterdam; Wieden+Kennedy Amsterdam; 72andSunny; PostPanic; Norvell Jefferson; Team Volvo; ExPRtease; Being There; het pr bureau; Press Only; FinchFactor; Kult&Ace; XXS; Cuttlefish Ink; Mount Scott

- Museums: Frans Hals Museum; Amsterdam Museum of Bags; Multatuli Museum

- Finance: Triodos Bank; IBS Capital Allies;

- Other: amsterdam&partners; Amsterdam Neuroscience (VUmc); Limelight Foundation; Twinxter Academy; Aflatoun; CompaNanny; Trifleet Leasing; KUOStudio; LibRT; IMEC recruitment; VDS Training; Deloitte; De Pioniers Fabriek; FinCo Fuel; Firma Fluks; China InRoads; On the Spot; Audentity

- Restaurants: Pianeta Terra (Amsterdam); Bordo (Warsaw). 

Specialties: Copywriting, proofreading, editing, translations, and press & marketing copy.

school.name: London College of Fashion, University of the Arts London

profile_positions.title: Professional Copywriter, Copy Editor, Proofreader & Translator (NL-ENG)

profile_positions.description: Responsible for creating and implementing a new, synchronised PR strategy on an international level. Overseeing all PR activities and PR agencies. Writing of all press packs and releases, including business, financial, and seasonal fashion releases for all lines.
profile_positions.title: International PR Manager

profile_positions.description: Responsible for day-to-day PR activities and marketing; writing proposals for new business and PR/marketing opportunities; overseeing launch of new Mexx stores in UK.
profile_positions.title: Account Manager/Account Director

profile_positions.description: Positions from 1995 onwards: PR Officer; Marketing Officer; Events Manager; Publishing Manager
profile_positions.title: Marketing, Events & Publishing Manager
